title: Emmy Awards 2019 red carpet: Emilia Clarke and Naomi Watts lead the best dressed
text:
The 71st Primetime Emmy Awards took place in Los Angeles last night, with Emilia Clarke - pictured, in a plunging teal gown with matching platform heels, - Jodie Comer and Zendaya among those who took to the event's purple carpet.

The event, which is a celebration of American television, saw Phoebe Waller-Bridge's Fleabag, which took home four awards including Best Comedy Series.

British television hit, Game of Thrones had the most nominees overall, and the show won the coveted Best Drama Series award. Of the cast, nominees Lena Headey, Sophie Turner, Maisie Williams, attended the ceremony as well as Clarke.

Click through the gallery to see what everyone wore to the glittering event...
